title: How to Do Silly Things With Your Toy

steps.headline: Make wacky clothing with scraps of material from around the house.
steps.description: Try tissues, fabrics such as felt, paper, et cetera. If you own a box of craft supplies, this is a great opportunity!

steps.headline: Do an experiment on your toy.
steps.description: Take a clipping of fur or any part of its body and be all scientific. Tell your toy that they have a serious illness and they need to take a medicine. Be careful about making any permanent changes to your toy.

steps.headline: Find someone you know who is doing something scientific (like launching something into space) and ask them if they can use your toy in it.
steps.description: Don't play with fire, sharp things, or other dangerous things without adult supervision. Be aware that some experiments may cause your toy to be lost (e.g. if it is attached to a model rocket and the rocket gets lost).

steps.headline: Make a book about your toy.
Invite a friend over and play with your toys.
Make a spa for your toy.
Make your toy run for mayor.One toy will be a candidate for your toy city, and the other toys will vote for it.
Build a cardboard or draw a paper city for your toys.
Try to speak telepathically with your toy.
Do a rescue with a toy dangling by a thread, etc.
Make a movie with a toy.
Come up with your own silly ideas.

text: Make wacky clothing with scraps of material from around the house. Try tissues, fabrics such as felt, paper, et cetera. If you own a box of craft supplies, this is a great opportunity! Do an experiment on your toy. Take a clipping of fur or any part of its body and be all scientific. Tell your toy that they have a serious illness and they need to take a medicine. Be careful about making any permanent changes to your toy. Find someone you know who is doing something scientific (like launching something into space) and ask them if they can use your toy in it. Don't play with fire, sharp things, or other dangerous things without adult supervision. Be aware that some experiments may cause your toy to be lost (e.g. if it is attached to a model rocket and the rocket gets lost). Make a book about your toy.  Invite a friend over and play with your toys.  Make a spa for your toy.  Make your toy run for mayor.One toy will be a candidate for your toy city, and the other toys will vote for it.  Build a cardboard or draw a paper city for your toys.  Try to speak telepathically with your toy.  Do a rescue with a toy dangling by a thread, etc.  Pretend to hunt your toy.  Make a movie with a toy.  Come up with your own silly ideas. The sky is the limit!
